mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_id AS "orderId", a.product_id AS "productId", a.product_name AS "productName", a.product_no AS "productNo", a.purchase_num AS "purchaseNum", a.order_money AS "orderMoney", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN shop_purchase_order b ON b.id = a.order_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop_purchase_order_item( id, order_id, product_id, product_name, product_no, purchase_num, order_money, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderId}, #{productId}, #{productName}, #{productNo}, #{purchaseNum}, #{orderMoney}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE shop_purchase_order_item SET order_id = #{orderId}, product_id = #{productId}, product_name = #{productName}, product_no = #{productNo}, purchase_num = #{purchaseNum}, order_money = #{orderMoney}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
